title: Cost of a liver transplant on the National Health Service in the United Kingdom 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Cost in British poundss.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and lowest at Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and minimum Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.

The Share of respondents is highest at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and lowest at Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Cost in British poundss.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and lowest at Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Cost in British pounds 10000-20000.
Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 has 2.33 times more Share of respondents than Cost in British pounds 2300-5000 which is has the lowest.

Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 is higher than any other Cost in British poundss with value 21.0, followed by 10000-20000, and More than 20000. Down to Cost in British pounds 2300-5000 with the lowest value 9.0.
Cost in British pounds Less than 760, and 760-2300 share the same value 17.0.
The average Share of respondents in all 6 Cost in British poundss is 16.83.
Summing up the values of all Cost in British poundss, we get total 101.0.
